# Data

Download from ESGF [portal](https://esgf-node.llnl.gov/search/cmip6/) using the `rcmip6` package

Process netcdf files using [Climate Data Operators](https://code.mpimet.mpg.de/projects/cdo) bash script [here](scripts/cdo%20bash%20script.sh)
